body: I don’t know how this site works but I think it is time for Nhentai to incorporate a purge system (replace the old version with the latest) unless is a different translation, language it doesn’t make sense to have 5+ post of the same title... About this story I think this swinging is about to turn sour or it already did but it is clear how this is going to pan out and page #37 is a clear indication that this is not "pure" swinging in the sense of not keeping secrets to your partner...
this has been uploaded a dozen or so times now what the hell
